org.jasig.cas.web.support
类 CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.web.util.CookieGenerator
      org.jasig.cas.web.support.CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator

public class CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator
extends org.springframework.web.util.CookieGenerator

Extends CookieGenerator to allow you to retrieve a value from a request.

Also has support for RememberMe Services

从以下版本开始：
3.1
作者：
Scott Battaglia
